Title: Relates to contractual liability insurance policies
Summary: Relates to contractual liability insurance policies; requires reimbursement to the provider for all obligations incurred by a provider under the terms of a service contract, or in the event of the provider's nonperformance, provide or pay on behalf of the provider all covered contractual obligations incurred by the provider.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to contractual liability insurance policies
